title: 3 and Out - Steelers Hire Flores, Wentz's Indy Future,  NFL Combine Bubble, Belichick's Assistant Recycling, Weak QB Class
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Steelers Hire Flores, Wentz's Indy Future,  NFL Combine Bubble, Belichick's Assistant Recycling, Weak QB Class
description:
John discusses the upside of Brian Flores taking a job as a Steelers assistant, if the Colts could part ways with Carson Wentz, why the NFL's combine bubble never made any sense other than for PR, why Belichick recycling fired former assistants is a problem, and why this year's weak QB class will define the entire draft.
